original_text: King Xerxes caused everyone who lived in his kingdom to pay taxes. It included those who lived far away, on the coast of the sea.
korean_text: 아하수에로 왕이 그의 본토와 바다 섬들로 하여금 조공을 바치게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: King Xerxes caused everyone who lived in his kingdom to pay taxes.
sentences.korean_translation: 왕 크세르크세스는 그의 왕국에 사는 모든 사람들에게 세금을 내게 했습니다.

sentences.original_text: It included those who lived far away
on the coast of the sea.
